review_text: it's a beautiful car specially because of its day lights. its AC and speakers also extremely good. the best part is its acceleration and the sound the car makes while moving. it's a special car and has no competitors. the only thing i am not happy with is the fuel average

review_text: Everything is brand new.imported 6 months ago. Car has a lot of features. Its fuel average is not so good but ride is smooth. Ground clearance is good. Overall when it starts being manyfactured in pakistan it will be a good value for money......,.......,...............................
